column5: Very sorry to hear, my thoughts and prayers are with you.
Rest in Peace Chris.  Our family send its thoughts and prayers to the Lindners.
How truely sad.  I can only hope that Rob and his family may get some sort of peace from this.  I can't even imagine the heartache  Our condolances to the family.  Joey & Tybo
My most sincere and heart felt condolences to the Lindner family.
Chris you fought a long battle young man rest in peace now.  All our thoughts have been sent over the years and will continue for your loved ones Rob and Nicole.
Our heartfelt condolences to the family, and who all who have been touched by Chris.  I for one will continue keeping Believe in my signature...in his honour....  Cliff and Carole
Very sad news indeed. My deepest sympathies to Rob and his family.
That is sad new.  My condolences to Rob and the rest of the Lindner family.
Jackie and I are so sorry to hear this sad new's. Chris put up a long, brave fight. May God Bless him. Our thoughts are with Rob and Nichol.
I'm without words...I can't even begin to imagine...My thoughts are with you and your family Rob.
My condolences to Rob and the rest of the Lindner family. I hope the pain is soon forgotten and the great memories are cherished forever.  God Bless.

Rob,  As a parent I can not phathom the pain that you and you r family are going through.  My prayer goes out to you and may the thought that Chris is pain free carry you through this difficult time.  FLEX - John

Rob Lindner informed me that Chris Lindner left us around 8 a.m. today after a 5 1/2 year fight with cancer.  Let's put Chris, Rob, his sister Nicole and his mother in our thoughts and prayers.  Chris was a fighter with tons of courage.
Sorry to hear that Connie !  Chris had more courage than I could ever hope to have.  God Speed little one and our deepest sympathies to you Rob, and your family.  Wayne and Leah

A terrible loss for our OFC family, one that I can not imagine!  Be strong Rob, You and Chris are in my families thoughts and prayers tonight.  My tears shed for you tonight.    Steve, Coop, Carson, Kristi
Sad, sad news indeed. My condolences to the Lindner family.
My heart and prayers got out to Chris, Rob, and the whole family!  Forever in our hearts!
Sad news for sure and Chris was indeed a tough little guy.  Condolances from myself & Diane
....Terrible, terrible news. Please accept my deepest condolences Rob and Nicole.
My heartfelt condolences to you and your family, Rob. Little Chris has won his battle.
Very sad  indeed My heartfelt condolences to the entire Linder family. May Chris rest in peace
Very sad news indeed. Prayers go out to the Lindner family.
My condolences Rob. That is very sad news.  My heart goes out to you and your family.
Sincere, heartfelt condolences. Barbara & John
My sincerest sympathies.     His life has inspired many.
Our condolences Rob. That is very sad news.  Beans and Maribeth
My heart goes out to you, deepest condolences.  Dan
My condolences to the Lindner family.
May god be with you and your family in this troublesome time.
Very sad news indeed. My heart goes out to Speedtroll and his family.
So sorry Rob. I cannot imagine the courage the little guy has shown over the last several years. We will miss him. He has a special place in all our hearts here.  Rick
Very sad to hear..... My deepest sympathies goes out to the Lindner's family
Rob, I am sorry for what you, your daughter and the rest of your family are experiancing right now....May you find some peace...  A father should never have to bury his son.....
Devastating news!! As a father of young children, my heart goes out to the family. You have my most sincere condolences. Young Chris has finally found peace.
My sincerest condolences to the Lindner family.
Our thoughts & prayers are with Chris,and the family at this very difficult time. Chris put up a very brave fight,and is in a better place now at peace.
Sorry to hear about Chris. He fought a long hard battle. Chris's situation is why many of us had, and still have, the word "Believe" in their signatures. My condolences also to Rob's family.
